hero.headline: I turn your ideas into high-performance software solutions.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.subtitle: Showcase of my skills
welcome.message: This interactive portfolio demonstrates my creative and technical capabilities. The projects featured here highlight some of my web development achievements. For your professional projects, I design custom solutions tailored to your specific requirements. I am available to discuss your projects or to join your team as a developer.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: About me and my education
about.description: I'm not just a developer - I'm a digital architect, a passionate soul obsessed with the magic behind every line of code. My kingdom? The intersection between the relentless logic of algorithms and the boundless creativity of the modern web.I firmly believe that the best applications aren't those that work perfectly, but those that solve real problems with discreet elegance. My approach? Transforming technical complexity into user simplicity.

list.title: EMIT Business Hub
list.description: Complete web application for training and human resources management at EMIT Business Hub. Features an intuitive interface, robust backend, and innovative QR code badge generation for all members, staff, and managers. Simplifies member validation with one-click approval and automatic email notifications.

list.title: CyberCafe OpenService
list.description: Innovative web application for complete cybercafe management with smart timer system, integrated payment and real-time financial analysis. Automatic generation of daily revenue reports and weekly income visualization through interactive charts.

list.title: Auto-ecole
list.description: Public web application module for driving school enabling course discovery, fee consultation and preparatory theory tests. Intuitive interface with schedule management and real-condition exam simulation. Developed in collaboration with Raharisoa.

list.title: ISI
list.description: Development of RPA (Robotic Process Automation) module for e-payment of Synthetic Intermittent Tax at tax center A. MERISE design with automation of declaration and payment processes for intermittent taxpayers.

list.title: Radio Tsiry
list.description: Complete web platform for Radio Tsiry enabling live listening, content search and audio discovery. Intuitive interface with integrated chat system to communicate directly with radio staff and propose real-time information broadcasts.

list.title: Homevers - Property Management
list.description: Web application for apartment management with complete payment and billing system. Admin interface enabling addition of new apartments and customized tenant assignment according to preferences. Developed in collaboration with Emmanuel Alexis to optimize rental management.

descriptions.uiux: In simple terms: I create websites so easy to use that even your grandmother could order online without calling for help!
descriptions.academic: Graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Intranet and Internet Application Development (DAII) from EMIT, University of Fianarantsoa in Madagascar.
descriptions.networks:
Networks
Mastery of network fundamentals: Cisco configuration, routing (RIP, EIGRP), NAT and IP address management for infrastructures.
descriptions.ai: Exploration of artificial intelligence technologies and their integration into innovative applications.
